entries.meaning: A mindset; a way of thinking; a set of beliefs.
examples: Before he can succeed, he will have to shed the mentality that he can get by without hard work.

entries.meaning: The characteristics of a mind described as a system of distinctive structures and processes based in biology, language, or culture, etc.; a mental system.
examples: […]  the new mentality [of Romantic poetry]...is a mentality of self-authorization.
